conbody.p:
Attributes specify properties of the content that can be used to determine how the content should be processed. uses them to:
Support content referencing
Support translation and localization
Filter content
Flag content

Many attributes are mentioned in this model within the context of the elements on which they can be used. However, this section provides a summary of common attributes available within the Information Model and Authoring Guidelines that can be used on many different elements.
